# Note Taker
  
  
  ## Description
    This This application utilizes express to create, save, and delete notes.
  
  ## Table of Contents
  - [Installation](#installation)
  - [Usage](#usage)
  - [Credit](#credit)
  - [License](#license)
  - [Questions](#questions)
  
  ## Installation
      None
  
  ## Usage 
    Enter a title and text for a note you'd like to save. Delete notes when they're no longer needed.
